summary: 256 color colorsheme to supplement dark colorschemes.
name: charged-256.vim
description:
There are a lot of good color schemes out there, but not many use good colors for vim itself (split, tabs, line numbers, etc...). This colorscheme is meant to be used in conjunction with an existing color scheme. It only highlights vim itself (not any code).

Screenshot: http://chargedsoftware.com/~charged2885/files/charged-256.png
install_details: Put it in ~/.vim/colors and :colorscheme your_favorite_colorscheme then :colorscheme charged-256.
